title: How does an iPhone last for years? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m really sorry to break the bubble of misconception for you, but iPhones don’t last for long. Rather it’s very subjective. It completely depends on usage and how a person handles any phone in that case. My friend bought iPhone 6s the day it released in India. His phone got screwed up within a year and now happily owns an iPhone 7. So I’m not making the point that iPhone doesn’t last but it solely depends on usage. I own Micromax ninja A91 which I bought back in 2013 and it still works fine. Few of my friends are using iPhone 5s it’s working fine. Thanks for A2A Rifhad.
